p: Besides methoxy species, water is a by-product whose formation is a clear indication of the methoxylation reaction. The direct role of methoxy species in the first C–C bond formation in the MTH reaction at 300 °C was recently reported by some of us. 23 Moreover, the methylation (which is also known as alkylation) has an impact on a spectrum of petro- and fine- chemical processes. 18– 26
